description:
Salt is the first 100% Romanian neobank.

Download the app, open your bank account and enjoy many benefits:

- You get 3%* interest per year on Current Account and Spaces.
- Easily save with Sapces for both small and big plans.
- A multicurrency card with an excellent exchange rate and a smart way to understand your spendings.
- A card ready for instant payments, enrollment in the Wallet and contactless withdrawals at the ATM.

Banking, but as you want it.

*Terms and conditions on www.salt.bank

SALT BANK S.A.
Address and Registered Office: Bd. Dimitrie Pompei, No. 5-7, Hermes Business Campus, Building B, 6th floor, Sector 2, 020335, Bucharest, Romania

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

Enjoy Raiffeisen Smart Mobile - smart banking - wherever you are!

Here are some of the benefits of Raiffeisen Smart Mobile:
• You can open your account and become a client straight from your phone, 100% online.
• Intuitive interface: Easily find anything you need.
• Secure authentication and authorization: Use PIN, fingerprint, or FaceID when registering your device.
• Smart Hour - BNR exchange rates: Exchange between RON and EUR at the NBR exchange rate from Monday to Friday 10:00 - 11:00.
• Application personalization: Personalize the Dashboard using a simple "drag & drop" feature. Optionally hide the balance for your accounts or change your username.
• Instant payments: Send payments that reach the destination in 10 seconds. Available 24/7/365 for all banks enrolled in the instant payments system.
• Saving Box: Automatically save money with every card payment and earn interest. Choose how much to save for each payment.
• Smart Search: Easily find and repeat past payments.
• Control over your cards: Block, reissue, or view your card PIN with just one touch.
• Direct access to the Smart Market loyalty app: Get rewards such as cashback, discounts, vouchers, and loyalty points.
• Future payments: Schedule future payments, set up direct debit bill payments, or save them as templates.
• Access to products for your daily needs: Open current accounts, savings accounts, and term deposits with ease. Get a personal loan, Flexicredit, 100% online in about 10 minutes.
• Smart investments: Purchase Raiffeisen Asset Management unit funds if you have already signed a contract and have the required documents.
• Push notifications: Receive instant updates on money going in or out of your current accounts or payments made with your card.
• SmartToken: Safely authenticate and authorize payments, 100% online, with Raiffeisen SmartToken.
• Pay utility bills: Multiple convenient ways to pay utility bills, including quick payment, barcode scanning, direct debit, and pre-filled payment forms. Top-up your prepaid mobile plan as well!
• Update personal data: Easily update necessary data directly within the application. No phone calls or bank visits required!

These are just some of the benefits offered by Raiffeisen Smart Mobile! Make sure to always have the latest app version installed from the app store to enjoy all the continuously added new features.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Download SelfPay Now and enjoy a simple and secure financial experience:

- Deposit cash instantly onto any card at SelfPay Payment Stations.
- Transfer money – instantly and for free – to friends or between your cards, regardless of the issuing bank.
- Pay bills and taxes to municipalities.

Turn every SelfPay Payment Station into a deposit ATM, and your cash is available on your card instantly. You can add money to any bank card enrolled in the app as easily as at a regular ATM. There is no need to search for a specific bank's ATM to make deposits, as you have access to over 12,000 SelfPay Payment Stations nationwide, located in major retail chains (Mega Image, Carrefour, Auchan, Cora, Kaufland, Profi), gas stations, and convenience stores.
Transfer money to friends who are app users or between your cards. With SelfPay Now, transfers are quick and free, regardless of the type of bank cards enrolled in the app.

Address: 153-155, Dacia Blvd. Bucharest, 5-7th floor, District 2

Be the first who tries the new Raiffeisen SmartToken app, integrated with Raiffeisen Smart Mobile and Raiffeisen Online - helping you to authenticate and order any transaction safely and securely, wherever you are, using just your mobile phone.
The app is an eToken that makes authentication easy and makes everything 100% online, without the need for a physical token.


To activate authentication via Raiffeisen SmartToken, all you need to do is tick the option in your new Raiffeisen Smart Mobile app.

No bank account or credit card? No problem. 

Download the PaysafeCard app and explore how you can use your cash online, get gift cards or use our app as a wallet with your personal debit Mastercard and IBAN.  
 
Access everything you need in a single tap. 

PaysafeCard
Register for free and pay with cash online. 
- Sign up (16+) and make payments within minutes of downloading the app Buy a prepaid code in 600.000+ sales outlets worldwide  
- Get a PaysafeCard code from the app. Simply select the payment method of your choice and buy one from the comfort of your own home at no additional cost 
- Use your PaysafeCard balance on over 3,500 websites including your favorite igaming and entertainment sites by entering your login details at the checkout  
- Stay safe by not sharing personal and financial details online   
- Manage your balance conveniently in in the app 
- Keep control of your costs through prepaid payments  

Account & Card*
Upgrade to Account & Card, the alternative to your bank account. Activate our feature online or in the app today to receive your debit Mastercard and your personal IBAN. 
- Register an account in minutes (18+)   
- Instant SEPA bank transfers  
- Physical & virtual debit Mastercards  
- Worldwide payments with your card including Apple Pay  
- Cash withdrawals at any ATM  
- Cash deposits via PaysafeCard and Paysafecash  
- Keep track of your transactions 

Gift Card Shop
Buy vouchers for your favourite shops, like the PlayStation Store, XBox, Twitch, Netflix, Zalando and more. Give it to your loved ones or simply use it to protect your payment details online.  

Get your PaysafeCard prepaid codes without leaving your house. Simply buy them online without any extra fees.  

Questions
 
Please contact info@paysafecard.com or visit our website www.paysafecard.com for more information, assistance and our terms and conditions. You can also find us on Facebook, X and Instagram: @paysafecard  

Say goodbye to multiple apps and download PaysafeCard to simplify your finances.  

*Available in selected countries

About XTB
XTB is a global financial institution trusted by over 1.7 million clients. We provide access to a wide range of investment options including stocks, ETFs,CFD trading on currencies, commodities, indices, and more. Our platform also includes Investment Plans, interest on uninvested funds and ISA. All of this is available in one easy-to-use app — a single, powerful ecosystem where your money works.

Buy stocks and ETFs commission-free
The XTB app gives you access to over 4500 stocks and ETFs from 16 major exchanges around the world. Invest in stocks and ETFs with 0% commission.*

Choose from thousands of CFDs
Trade CFDs based on currency pairs (Forex), commodities, indices, stocks, and ETFs.

Make the most of our savings solutions:

Investment Plans
At XTB, you can create a personalised Investment Plan that will help you regularly set aside small amounts, invest passively and reach your desired goals, like: travel, retirement, or a new house.

Interest on free funds
You can profit while waiting for the perfect investment opportunity. All your uninvested funds earn interest.

Flexible Stocks & Shares ISA
An ISA  is a tax-efficient savings and investment account that allows you to earn interest or returns without paying tax on them.

2FA - an extra layer of security
We implemented 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) through SMS verification to ensure that no one gains unauthorized access to your XTB account. 

Safe and secure deposits and withdrawals
Make a deposit instantly by credit/debit cards like Visa/Mastercard. Easily transfer funds between sub-accounts within XTB or withdraw to your personal bank account - all safely and securely. 

24h/5 support
Our customer service team offers support in 18 languages and is available 24/5 hours a day,  via email, chat or phone.

Free demo account
Open a free demo account in seconds and explore your investment ideas with zero risk. Experience real market conditions without using your own capital. When you’re ready, open a real  XTB account for free and start putting your money to work for real.

Trainings and webinars
Explore our extensive video library and gain access to hundreds of hours of educational webinars. Learn at your own pace with clear, structured content . 

Market news and analysis
Get breaking news and read professional market analysis from our award-winning research team.

Advanced charts and technical analysis
Find the best investment opportunities using over 35 indicators, different chart types, advanced technical analysis, and other features in the app.

Additional investing tools
Stay ahead with our suite of investing tools: track key macroeconomic events with the Economic Calendar, manage risk and plan using the Investor’s Calculator, set real-time Price Alerts to catch market moves and explore global Market Sentiment to make more informed decisions.

*For monthly turnover up to 100,000 EUR. Transactions above this limit will be charged a commission of 0.2% (minimum 10 GBP).
**CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 
72% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider.
You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Your capital is at risk. The value of your investments may go up or down.Tax treatment depends on your individual circumstances and ISA regulations which may change.T&Cs apply.

Aircash is a multi-currency digital wallet and issuer of the Aircash Mastercard card.

With Aircash, users can top up instantly and easily with cash or any credit/debit card. Withdraw money at any ATM, point of sale of Aircash partners or bank account. Send to friends or family, pay for various services, buy telecom and digital vouchers and top up numerous online accounts.
With Aircash, you have full control over your money – fast, easy, and always available. With the Aircash Wallet and Aircash Prepaid Mastercard, you have worldwide flexibility, whether online, in stores, or at ATMs.

AIRCASH MASTERCARD
Get the Aircash Mastercard at our retail locations or through Amazon and use it at over 30 million locations worldwide. The card is managed directly through your Aircash Wallet – simply load it and get started!

DEPOSIT
Instantly and fee-free, load funds to your Aircash Wallet with cash at more than 200,000 retail locations or with any credit/debit card.

MONEY TRANSFER
Send money to friends and family, no matter where they are. The funds are available in seconds in their Aircash Wallet in their currency.

SERVICES
Buy tickets, pay bills, get vouchers, and top up online accounts – all in one app.

WITHDRAWAL
No problem – use your Aircash Mastercard at ATMs worldwide or withdraw cash from your Aircash Wallet at selected retail locations.

Get the Aircash app now and enjoy all the everyday benefits Aircash has to offer!

Revolut is the money app designed to spend, save, and set money aside.

What's in store:
• Get your own customisable debit card and virtual cards to add to your Apple or Google Wallet (personalisation fees may apply)
• Send money between friends on Revolut (minimum age restriction applies)
• Receive money from everyone — even if they’re not on Revolut — with Payment Links
• Save and earn with a Savings account
• Get a 360º view of your money with Analytics
• If you’re in the UK, you can move to the main app once you turn 16

 
How does it work?
1. Download this app and create an account (if you're below the age of data consent, your parent will need to create an account for you from their Revolut app. You can check the age of data consent in your country below)
2. Get approved by your parent or guardian
3. Choose a debit card and customise it with text, stickers, and your own sketches (personalisation fees may apply), then order it from your parent's app
4. Add your card to Apple or Google Wallet to start spending straight away (minimum age restriction applies)
 
Parents and guardians, this part's for you ↓
With Revolut, they can manage their money independently, under your supervision.
Teens above the age of data consent can sign up themselves, but you'll have access to security controls, like spending notifications, in-app card freezes, and many other features to give you peace of mind.
If you have teens below the age of data consent, you can create an account for them from your Revolut app. Here’s how: 
1. Have them download this app and create an account
2. Approve their account from your Revolut app
3. Order their prepaid debit card from your app (personalisation fees may apply)

Find your country's age of data consent ↓

In Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Gibraltar, Iceland, Latvia, Malta, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or the United States:
• Teens aged 13+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Teens aged 12 or under (minimum age restrictions apply) will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 13+

In Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Italy, Lithuania, or Spain:
• Teens aged 14+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 13 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 14+

In Australia, Czech Republic, Greece, or Slovenia:
• Teens aged 15+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 14 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 15+ (referrals subject to feature availability in your country)

In Croatia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Romania, or Slovakia:
• Teens aged 16 and above can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those ages 15 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 16+

Be among the first!
The most smart banking in Romania is now on mobile phone and tablet and brings a new perspective to money. 

What has George in store for you:

•	George Go makes it easy: transfers, Bill Payments and FX - easy, fast and go! 
•	George Go knows them all: With Autosuggest you transfer your George contacts even faster. You know the name, George Go the IBAN. 
•	Scan & Pay & smile please: transfer faster via camera. NEW: with IBAN scanner! 
•	Accounts & Co: Keep track of your finances. Live and in color.
•	Go faster: With shortcuts from the account list directly to the desired function. 
•     Easy Going: Fast and secure access to George Go with Easy Access and your phone's lock (eg Face ID, Touch ID, Pattern, PIN).


And there's more: George is constantly being expanded with innovative features.

To experience George on mobile/tablet, you need an account with BCR as well as a valid George account. The application requires at least iOS 10.3 and It works also on iOS-powered tablets.

Fleur is a cute and simple budget planner and tracker app. The app allows you to easily add daily expenses and income. You can also set a monthly budget, create multiple accounts and track your debt. Fleur is an all in one app that will help you manage your money.

Key Features:
- Minimal, elegant, and aesthetically pleasing design
- Easily log expenses and income
- Set a monthly budget
- View insights and understand spending habits
- View transaction history
- Add repeating transactions
- Create new categories
- iCloud sync
- No sign in required
- Easy search and filter

Read more about our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy here:
https://fleurbudget.com/privacy_terms.html

We are always there for you!
- If you are facing any issues or have questions, please feel free to email us. Hope you enjoy using our app as much as we do! :)

24pay is Must Have App on your phone for direct, secure and fast payments. With a modern design and a user-friendly menu, 24pay App behaves like an eWallet that offers a convenient solution for daily payments. Pay for a wide range of products and services with any of the cards enrolled in the application.

Public Transport 

Users have the possibility to pay for public transport tickets and subscriptions directly from the app, without interacting with a cashier or needing cash.
Easy paying the trip, directly on the mobile phone, from the App.

24pay app is available for public transport through a modern, fast and secure payment solution in 19 main cities from Romania: Bucharest (STB), Timisoara (STPT), Cluj-Napoca (CTP Cluj), Iasi (CTP Iasi), Brasov (RATBV SA), Arad (CTP Arad), Ramnicu Valcea (ETA SA), Targu Jiu (Transloc), Piatra Neamt (TPN), Sibiu (Tursib), Baia Mare (SC Urbis SA), Resita (Transport Urban Resita), Sacele (Servicii Sacelene), Ploiesti (TCE), Roman (Solelga), Botosani (Eltrans), Constanta (CT Bus), Bacau, Sfantu Gheorghe (Sepsi Bus), Oradea (OTL). 

Bill Payments

Users have the possibility to pay invoices from different utility suppliers directly from the app:
-	electricity
-	gas
-	phone and internet
-	financial services
-	water
-	sanitation
-	others
The invoice can be scanned, imported or manually introduced by customer identifier (barcode, customer ID, phone number depending on the supplier).

Invoice dashboard functionalities:
-	save templates from various providers one payment for multiple invoices
-	partial payment of the invoices
-	real time balance update for the online suppliers
Mobile Top Up

Users have access to complete top-up services for major mobile operators (Orange, Vodafone, Telekom). Prepaid cards can be charged directly from the application, without going to a branch and without needing cash.

Parking

Users have the possibility to pay for parking services directly from the app, without interacting with a cashier or needing cash. The payment  is made for the entire period of occupying the parking lot (the minimum payment duration /value can be established).

Prepaid Vouchers

The value coupons are products with a fixed value, PIN loading type, which allow the use on different partner sites of online games and various e-money sites.

RCA insurance policy

Users interested in concluding a new RCA insurance policy through 24pay can compare the majority of the insurers’ offers available  in Romania for motor vehicles in the following categories: passenger cars, motorhomes, motorcycles and semi-trailers.

The process of issuing the policy is simple and fast, and the information can be retrieved by importing the necessary documents (driver's identity card and vehicle identity certificate), according to the legislation in force. After making the payment, the RCA policy will be available in the Wallet section of the application.

Users can very easily manage the renewal of the RCA, because they receive a notification warning the expiration period of the document.

Entertainment

Users have the possibility to pay for relaxation and leisure services directly from the app, without interacting with a cashier or needing cash.
Entertainment services available now:
-    massage chairs
- kiddie rides

Fitness

Users can pay for having access to more than 350 gyms partners from the Sanopass network.

About 24pay

24pay App was launched in 2018 and it’s FREE for users. In February 2022 the app was bought by PayPoint Services. 24pay eWallet allows payments by mobile phone for a wide range of services by adding the bank card Visa / Mastercard. Access to the application and confirmation of transactions is carried out by authentication with fingerprint or the 4-digit PIN24pay code.

tbi app- the app for smart payments!
Discover how you can make smart purchases directly from your mobile phone. You can buy anything you want from tbi's online partner stores and pay later, in 4 free installments or up to 60 fixed installments. 
Download tbi app and discover a different shopping experience: direct access from the app to hundreds of merchants, pay for products at your own pace, and easily manage your monthly installments for the products you already have from tbi. 

100% secure shopping  
Any order placed through tbi app is a secure transaction. In addition, you don't need to register your bank card or other current account details. Here's how you can enjoy relaxed shopping in just a few steps: 
• Download the app for free from App Store and register in the app (you only need an email address and phone number)  
• Search within the app and select the store from which you want to buy the desired products  
• You will be redirected to the partner store's website, where you can select the products and add them to your cart  
• Choose tbi bank installment payment option, follow the steps to obtain a shopping limit (if you already have a shopping limit from tbi bank, you will use the available limit)  
• Finalize your order and voila...it will arrive to you in the shortest time possible. 

Buy now, pay later 
You can choose how to pay for your purchases: up to 4 interest-free installments (for purchases with a value between 100 and 1,000 lei) or up to 60 convenient and fixed installments (for purchases with a value greater than 1,000 lei). In addition, you will have all the information about your purchases and monthly installments in one place, and the app will remind you when you need to pay. 

Manage your credits directly from the app and monitor your transactions  
In the "My Products" tab, you can access all your loans at tbi bank and check the transactions made through tbi app. You have access to all the details of your credits, you are always up to date with the repayment dates, and you can pay the installments from the app, simply with one touch. You can obtain up to 25,000 lei in extra cash If you need extra financing, you can request up to 25,000 lei, easily and directly from the app. The process is 100% digital, the response is instant, and we will send the money to any bank account from any bank in Romania. 

Download tbi app for free right now and enjoy inspired shopping!

The most important features from application are:
 
• Access based on fingerprint or facial recognition
• Transfers to  national beneficiaries
• Transfers between own accounts
• Exchange rate
• Transactions History
 
Use the benefits of mobile banking services.
In addition, you can use the YOU BRD application for the authentication to the internet banking service.

developer: ASOCIATIA BIROUL ASIGURATORILOR DE AUTOVEHICULE DIN ROMANIA
description: Momentele nefericite au nevoie de o cale ușoară. Amiabila este aplicația gratuită care digitalizează procesul unei constatări amiabile.

Tu cum îți reînnoiești asigurarea auto RCA? Șoferii buni economisesc timp și bani! Descoperă și tu aplicația Reasig ce îți oferă un nou mod de a te asigura, mai simplu, mai rapid și prietenos! Peste 350.000 de șoferi au ales Reasig.

Deși prețurile asigurărilor auto RCA sunt în creștere, aplicația Reasig îți oferă mai mult timp pentru tine și familia ta. Împreună economisim cea mai importantă resursă - TIMPUL.
•  FĂRĂ GRIJI - verificăm valabilitatea și îți trimitem notificări pentru expirarea RCA-ului, rovinietei, ITP-ului, trusei medicale, stingătorului sau pentru următoarea revizie.
•  SUPORT 7/7 – suntem aici să îți oferim toate informațiile, chiar atunci când ai nevoie de ele;
•  CÂȘTIGI TIMP - cel mai rapid mod de a-ți reînnoi asigurarea obligatorie RCA sau asigurarea medicală de călătorie;
•  ALEGI INFORMAT – ai la dispoziție un calculator cu ofertele tuturor asiguratorilor din România și îți prezentăm toate opțiunile suplimentare, astfel încât să poți lua cea mai bună decizie;
•  PLĂTĂ RAPIDĂ – plătești asigurarea direct cu cardul, în maximă siguranță, prin procesatorul de plăți partener;
•  DOAR DESCHIS – uită de grija programului agenției de asigurări! Aplicația este tot timpul pregătită pentru nevoile tale, doar baterie la telefon și acces la internet să ai.
•  OFERTE 24/7 - primești oferte în timp real de la asiguratori precum Asirom, Allianz, Generali, Grawe, Groupama, Omniasig, Hellas Direct, Axeria. Chiar și în weekend!

Descarcă aplicația și te așteptăm cu drag în lumea Reasig, unde o simplă asigurare medicală de călătorie, o simulare de asigurare auto RCA sau reînnoire nu îți mai irosește timpul și te scapă de griji! Nu mai este nevoie să păstrezi documente fizice sau să cauți prin hârtii. Tot ce ai nevoie este telefonul tău și de aplicația Reasig.

Știai că:
* În aplicația Reasig poți solicita și alte tipuri de asigurări prin care să-ți asiguri o călătorie fără griji prin asigurarea de călătorie, să-ți protejezi căminul prin asigurarea PAD sau facultativă de locuință, mașina printr-o asigurare Casco sau prin serviciul de extra asistență rutieră?
* Dacă ești profesionist și domeniul tău necesită o asigurare obligatorie precum asigurarea pentru călători și bagaje aferentă serviciului de TAXI, UBER sau BOLT sau asigurarea pentru MALPRAXIS o poți solicita direct din aplicație?
* Echipa noastră de asistență clienți este mereu pregătită să te ajute în cazul în care ai întrebări sau neclarități, 7 zile din 7. Contactează-ne pe chat-ul din aplicație pentru soluții eficiente.

developer: ING BANK N.V. AMSTERDAM SUCURSALA BUCURESTI
description:
At ING we believe your bank must be simple and intuitive, our life being complex enough. It is not only about the money, but also about the freedom of accessing them securely, wherever you are.
 
- You can open your online current account, if you are Romanian citizen, of minimum 18 years old, you have a permanent address in Romania and have a valid identity card
- You may have a joint account for family expenses
- Your kid also can get a current account and card, with you permanently in control.
- You can access instant personal needs loans, credit cards and overdrafts.
- You can simulate the eligible amount for your mortgage loan.
- You protect your loved ones with life, health, or salary insurance.
- You can access term deposits and savings accounts.
- You can issue virtual cards and instant add them to Apple Pay, Garmin Pay
- You can invest in mutual funds.
- You can use FX at better rates.
 
All financial chores become simple with Home'Bank, with an intuitive interface, fast access and well thought functions which are meant to help you.
You are in full control of your money, directly on the phone which will become a trusted device:
 
- You can authenticate without SMS code once the device is registered as trusted.
- You have the option of simple logging on, with fingerprint or facial authentication.
- You pay faster using only your password.
- You receive push notifications for 3D secure payments authorisation, also for all the operations from your current accounts.
- Do not forget to activate geolocation. It helps us detect fraudulent activity initiated from foreign geographic areas in Home’Bank.
 
 
 
You decide where you shop! You can access offers from over 100 partners in Bazar, from which you will receive cash-back.
 
You have plenty of payment options:
- Alias Pay: payments based on the phone number only.
- You can pay with the phone. You don’t need a physical wallet, you pay with Apple Pay
- Paying your invoices, with Scan&Pay option, you can pay your invoices just by scanning them with your phone camera.
- Online instant payments: RON Transfers to other banks in Romania are instant, including invoice payments or to other suppliers, if their bank is enrolled in the instant payment program.
- Payment requests: You can send payment requests to friends from your phonebook. They receive a payment notification in Home’Bank.
 
 
Still not convinced? More details here: https://ing.ro/lp/onboarding

The application is available in Romanian language and uses cookies.
By using the application, you express your consent for cookies usage. You can read more about cookies, here https://www.ing.ro/ing-in-romania/informatii-utile/termeni-si-conditii/cookies
 
ING Home'Bank is more than a banking app – it is your dashboard for your money.
 
Why choose ING?
Because it is simple. Fast. Thought out for you.
Every detail exists to make your life easy, while you have more time for what’s most important to you.

Cu aplicația de trading BT Capital Partners, ai acces la Bursa de Valori București și la cele mai importante piețe internaționale, gata să începi să tranzacționezi, oricând și oriunde. Ce poți face? 

BT Top-up 
          - alimentează contul tău de tranzacționare, adaugand bani instant sau prin tranfer bancar clasic.

Spot
          - Tranzacționezi pe cont propriu sau cu ajutorul unui broker dedicat.  
          - Ai acces la BVB și peste 25 de piețe internaționale, în RON, EUR, USD și GBP. 
 
Marjă (BVB)
          - Poți cumpăra acțiuni din indicele BET-XT*, folosind alte garanții.  

Administrare discreționară (BVB)
          - Portofoliul tău este administrat de un expert, pentru un proces fără bătăi de cap.  

Indiferent dacă vrei să iei deciziile singur sau să te bazezi pe specialiști, BT Capital Partners îți oferă toate opțiunile de care ai nevoie.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)
Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.
